brithanya chanal - 4 nalikawa magin shri lankawa wiwechanayata lak kara pracharaya kala widiyo pataya sambandhayen yalith warak karunu dakwima anawashya kriyawak bawa janamadhya ha thorathuru amathi keheliya rambaukwalla mahatha awadharanaya keleya.ema rupawahini aayathanaya adala asathya widiyo pataya pilibandawa yali yalith pracharaya kirimata uthsaha darana bawada eya mul awasthawedima widyanukulawa asathya ekak bawata thahawuru kala bawada hethema sandahan keleya.amathiwaraya me bawa kiya sitiye rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwedi eeye (20) pawathi madhya hamuwakata ek wemini.shri lanka rajaye hamudawa wisin samanya damila wasiyange as banda wedi thaba ghathanaya karamin manawa himikam ullanghanaya karana bawata ema widiyo pataya magin pracharayak gena yamata brithanya chanal - 4 nalikawa uthsaha gath bawa ki ee mahatha elesa samanya wasiyan mara damime kisidu awashyathawayak rajaye hamudawata nathayida kiweya.dashaka thunakata aasanna kalayak me rate pawathi thrasthawadaya awasan wimath samaga owun me aakarayata jathyanthara mattamin shri lankawa apa kirthiyata path kirimata uthsaha gath athara yalith warak ewani uthsahayaka niratha wimata sudanam wi thibena bawada hethema penwa dunneya.mulma awasthawedi owun ewani kriyawakata prawishta wimath samaga kriyathmaka wu shri lanka rajaya paya 72k athulatha lowa kirthimath wisheshagnyayange wishleshanayen yuthuwa ema widiyo pataya asathya ekak bawata oppu kala bawa ki janamadhya ha thorathuru amathiwaraya shri lankawata ewani chodanawak nokara me abhiyogaya owun bara gatha yuthu bawada kiya sitiyeya.

bhishana samaye rugatha kirim aarambha kala teli natyaye kamarawa meheyawima sidukale ke ee dharmasena wisini.namuth mulu chithrapata kshethrayama ohu handinwuye kichi dharme namini.ese nomathi nam kichiya wiya.rupagatha kirim awasanwannata pramadawu boho dinawala dharmeda apa samaga nawathinnata ben films ekata eyi.api hathara denage ra kama sandaha nishpadanayen apata rupiyal dahak ho ekdas pansiyak labe.borallata awuth palamuwenma rits sinama shalawata pahalin athi wayin stos eken bothalayak miladi gannemu.rathriyata kama miladi gannata hotalayakata yannata sudanamwu wita dharme eyata erehi weyi.'oya kadawala jarawa kanawata wada ee salliwalin aduma kuduma tika aran gihin api uyagena kamu' yi ohu kiyayi.dharme rasata iwimehi samarthayeki.ben ekata ena ohu andum marukara kussiyata wadi uyannata patan gani.mama ohuta sahaya wemi.ekala mata iwima thaba hattiyak walandak allannata tharamwath danumak nowiya.pasukaleka kandayamakata wuwath uya dennata tharam shasthraya praguna karaganimata mul aarambhaya wuye kichi dharmaya samaga uya damagath adithalamayi.dharme bath muttiya lipa thaba parippu uyanne niwithi kolada ekathu karamini.niwithi kola nathi dawasaka parippuwalata damimata monawa ho kola wargayak genena lesa ohu mata kiweya.
